name: Hate Free Heroes RPG (Mobile Version)
detailed_description:
Play Hate Free Heroes RPG from any PC or Mobile device with a web browser (free with purchase). Play the same game anywhere, and there are no downloads needed. Chat system allows you to chat with other players and a leaderboard system ranks your progress over other members.

*Mobile games are saved on your local device using cookies. Games saved on Steam cloud does not apply to browser version. Ranking and leaderboard progress is saved on U Game Me servers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or 1.80 GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
